title: Bernie Sanders | Trump Returns from Vietnam Amid Cohen Fallout: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at President Trump's summit with Kim Jong-un and the fallout from Michael Cohen’s congressional testimony.

Then, Senator Bernie Sanders talks about his second run at the presidency and what it's like competing for office with his friends and colleagues.
